          <title>
            <string language="en">Making sound loud</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden stichhaltiges lautes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication de fort sain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo alto sadio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare forte sano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή υγιούς δυνατού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de ruidoso sano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that hitting the drum hard makes the sound loud.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hearing</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß das stark das 
Schlagen der Trommel den Ton laut bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que cela frapper le 
tambour fait dur au bruit fort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que aquele bater o 
cilindro faz duramente ao som alto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che quello colpire il
tamburo duro rende al suono forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το χτύπημα του 
τυμπάνου σκληρού καθιστά τον ήχο δυνατό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que eso golpear el 
tambor difícilmente hace el sonido ruidoso.</string>
          </description>
